meanings.definition: A radiographic image of a vein.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the phlebogram of my leg vein.
meanings.sent2: The phlebogram revealed a blockage in the vein.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd find a phlebogram so fascinating!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a phlebogram, capturing every detail of her joy.
meanings.sent5: The phlebogram looked like a map of rivers in my body.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a radiographic image of a vein.
meanings.sent1: The technician explained the phlebogram process to me.
meanings.sent2: Creating a phlebogram requires precision and skill.
meanings.sent3: Watching the phlebogram being made was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The phlebogram process is like taking a snapshot of your veins.
meanings.sent5: The phlebogram process felt like a peek inside my own body.
